name: Eyeless | Horror Game
description:
Recommended requirements
IOS 8+
IPhone 5+

*** For more thrills play in the dark and use headphones ***

West Virginia, USA, 1985.
One day in the forests of West Virginia gang of teenagers attacked a lost man. They brutally mocked him, hammered nails into the body, the eyes gouged out. And after the mutilated body thrown into a ravine. But that was not the end ...

In this game you find yourself after the accident in the forest. You only have a video camera, equipped with a flashlight, but the batteries are about to sit down. Goal of the game to find a certain number of human limbs left by other victims. Can you escape or death will overtake you? Download the game Eyeless | Horror Game and find the answer right now!
